    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update()
        According the genre id, update or insert: if id is -1, insert genre if id is greater than 0, update genre
        Returns:
        int: 1 if has been updated or inserted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error

      • delete

        public int delete()
        According the genre id, delete that artist from the data base
        Returns:
        int: 1 if the genre has been deleted, 0 if didn't work, -1 if error
